mapper.insert: insert into SYS_ORG( org_name, org_mail, org_manager, org_phone, address, parent, hasChild, insert_time, last_update_time) values( #{orgName}, #{orgMail}, #{orgManager}, #{orgPhone}, #{address}, #{parent}, #{hasChild}, #{insertTime}, #{lastUpdateTime} );
mapper.update: update SYS_ORG set org_name = #{orgName}, org_mail = #{orgMail}, org_manager = #{orgManager}, org_phone = #{orgPhone}, address = #{address}, parent = #{parent}, hasChild = #{hasChild}, insert_time = #{insertTime}, last_update_time = #{lastUpdateTime} where ID=#{id}
